section.section: As often as the Board requests but at least quarterly, the State Treasurer shall advise the Board about the amount of the Fund in the custody of the State Treasurer.

text.section: On or before October 1 of each year, the Board shall submit to the Governor an annual report that includes a detailed statement of the balances and expenses of the Fund.
